page.text: With that final kick you're sent reeling back and then slump in a heap in front of your curvaceous predator. The frog girl squatting down to give you a look over, grinning broadly and uttering a little ribbit followed by a chuckle as she sizes you up as her meal. Her appreciation indicated doubly so when you hear the gurgle of her belly, seemingly not muffled by that layer of chub wrapped around her middle. The ample amphibian seems to be done anticipating and appreciating you visually though, or perhaps unwilling to wait let you recover. And so your predator hauls you up with smooth yet firm hands on your upper arms. You feel that flexible and long tongue lash out and run up and down your body, tasteing you, curling around your frame as her mouth gapes wide before you, then chomps down. The frog girl engulfing your head in her wide mouth in one movement. Your predator moaning in delight as she samples your face and neck and you feel her prodigious rack and groaning belly pressed softly against your body as she positions herself to start gobbling you down.

Cuddled close to her you can feel the soft warmth of her padded frame and the eagerness of her body to contain yours as she keeps you snug and under control while eating you alive. Her arms are powerful despite the softness of how they feel and they hold you firm as she swallows, a powerful loud glucking gulp pulling your chest into her mouth and your head into her throat. The amphibian curving you inwards easily as her hands shift down to your thighs and you slide easily down her throat towards her belly. Your struggles and protests of no import to her though some of the more spirited acts of defiance at least get her to chuckle muffledly around her ample mouthful of space traveller.

As the amphibian eats you alive that tongue gets, simply everywhere, twining between your legs, curling around your body and intruding between your thighs. the voracious frog seems to be intent on sampling you thoroughly as she eats you alive, your legs waving around in the air now as she starts to work you into her belly. The frog's gut starting to swell out as you're packed away behind her chub. The insides of the voracious frog stretching easily to contain you, proving positively soft, roomy and accomodating compared to other stomachs you'd had the misfortune to experience. It seems that soft fleshy sack behind that padded tummy is to be your new home as she's working your ass past her lips and crams your upper body inside her belly.

Over halfway past her gaping jaws now you know it won't take her long to chug you down. The amphibian grabbing ahold of your leg by your calf and ignoring the flailing of the other as she tips her head back and gulps and gobbles you down. The frog finally snapping her jaws shut and smacking her lips in satisfaction behind your feet. Your form sliding down and curling up inside her gut as she rubs and kneads at her middle with both hands. The froggy woman letting out a delighted ribbit and croak of pleasure then chuckles and patpats her middle as you push out, being able to only make indistinct handprints as you shove out against the thick walls of her tummy.

choice.text: try to escape her belly by force

page.text: You're entirely curled up inside her now and as you feel her soft innards all around you you settle down. It's really quite comfortable in here, even if she is intending to break you down becoming another layer of fat on her already amply padded form doesn't sound that bad at all. You hear the predator amphibian chuckle and shift her position, settling slowly into the water until she's floating on her back. The frog stroking her gut and croaking in delight as she hears her belly starting to gently but unmistakeably gurgle and churn around you.

gameover.text: Inside the comfy depths of the frog girl's gut you feel yourself stewing and digesting away. The sensation is surprisingly pleasant if you're not bothered by your pending dissolution, the steady rocking and gurgling of her gut softening you down to mush over an indulgently long time. But in the end all that's left is that slurry of goopy former space traveller, your form now a soft pliant mass in her tummy as she kneads her hands into her chub. The frog girl letting out delighted ribbits at feeling beyond her fat nothing more solid than a soup that her form steadily absorbs. Her tummy returning from its former distension to something more trim but still rounded as your nutrients are distributed to add to her fat softness.

page.text: You feel her patting her gut and smacking her lips in satisfaction and renew your struggles. You're not about to sit here quietly and get churned into more pudge on this chubby amphibian. The patpats of the frog seem somewhat condescending as they patpat her gut now that you vigorously attempt to upset her ample gut and escape your curvaceous prison. One can only hope you're too unruly a meal to keep down.

The frog girl is indulgent in her doting on her gut initially. But as you really get going in vigorously shoving and pushing at her insides she loses her condescending complacency and starts to urp and croak in distress, pressing her hands into her soft and distended belly to try and settle it. But even that is not enough to stop you as your stamina and energy proves too much for her. She lets out a sickening urp and doubles over in distress, retching as you take this moment to force your way back up her throat. You land in a heap amidst the mire waters, splashing into the dirty liquids as she horks you up and then collapses into a dismayed heap.

The frog girl dotes on her gut indulgently as you become unruly and uppity inside her belly. As you get a bit more vigorous the soft ribbiting and contentment of her resting form does give way somewhat to her giving you a squeeze with tummy muscles and both hands. But nothing more than that is garnered by your spirited attempt to escape. Your inevitable succumbing to fatigue makes the froggy give you a patpat through the walls of her chubby tummy, as if to go 'there there' about your stirling but ultimately futile effort to escape her innards. The gurgling digestive fluids are starting to get a bit more active around you as you realize there's nought you can do except turn into another layer of fat.

gameover.text: You can't escape, but that doesn't stop you squirming as she digests you. Your occasional resigned whimper and palm print pushing out doesn't get anything more than those condescending and doting pats from her though as you gurgle away. And in time nought is left inside her that would tell anyone that a spacetraveller had met her end inside the amphibian, her gut turning still softer under her hands as your mass turns liquid and compacts into a dense nutritious mass. Once that's done her gut trims out further, distributing the chub from your form all over to add to her thighs, ass, breasts and middle. What once was you is now a thin layer of well distributed softness covering the form of this dangerously curvaceous predator.
